name: Blink [Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1]
description:
Controls:
CTRL - Slide

WASD - Move

Left Click (Hold) - Grapple Hook

It all happens in the blink of an eye...

Play through a series of short-lived lucid dreams in a PS1-Style environment...

In this, you will face random and uncertain environments with nothing but a grappling gun and a will to wake up. None of this is real yet you feel so alive in this strange place... You don't know if there's really a reason to leave yet something is urging you to get out fast. 

Credits:

Game Design and Programming:

Pablo "ExpoDev" Heckman

Additional Programming:

CoderTom

Level Design and main texturing: 

James "Gunseeker" Cravotta

3D Modelling and Additional Level Design:

Ford_Hawkins

Taemolien

Part of the Brackeys Game Jam
